A

addNotification(String, int, String, String, BBjColor, BBjImage, ArrayList, String) - Method in class NotificationManager
add a new notification to the system with given properties
animate! - Variable in class Notification
The Toggle for the animationmode

B

background! - Variable in class Notification
The background color of the Notification

D

deleteID(int) - Method in class NotificationManager
delete the ID of an active notification
deleteNotification(String) - Method in class NotificationManager
delete a specific notification by its eventhandle which has to be given to it when creating it only safe method to delete a notification from outside!
dismiss(Boolean) - Method in class Notification
dismiss the window itself Caution!
dismiss! - Variable in class Notification
The time in seconds
dismissOnTimer(BBjTimerEvent) - Method in class Notification
called if a dismisstimer was initialized for the notification
display(Boolean) - Method in class Notification
build and display a notification

E

EventHandle! - Variable in class Notification
The Handle associated with the Window itself

F

fireNextFromBuffer() - Method in class NotificationManager
gets called when the notifications change, it will fire a new notification from the buffer to the displayed notifications if it reaches an amount of less than 5
firePush(String) - Method in class NotificationManager
fireevent when a notification is clicked

H

handle! - Variable in class NotificationButton
 
height! - Variable in class Notification
Height of the Notification

I

ID! - Variable in class Notification
ID that the window will hold
ID! - Variable in class NotificationButton
 
image! - Variable in class Notification
The Image displayed on the left Hand side of the Notification
imagewidth! - Variable in class Notification
The Width of the image

N

Notification - Class in <Unnamed>
 
Notification(int, int, int, String, int, int, int, String, NotificationManager, String, Boolean, String, BBjColor, BBjImage, ArrayList, String) - Constructor for class Notification
Initializing a Notification
NotificationButton - Class in <Unnamed>
 
NotificationButton(String, String) - Constructor for class NotificationButton
 
NotificationManager - Class in <Unnamed>
--------------------------
Manual
--------------------------
The plugin will use the BBjAPI-IDs as follows for each respective Notification (only mind if you´re working on the NotificationControlls themselves)
IDS WILL NOT BE BLOCKED OUTSIDE OF A NOTIFICATIONS CONTEXT!!!
NotificationManager() - Constructor for class NotificationManager
Constructor for the Manager

O

onButtonPush(BBjEvent) - Method in class Notification
called by the added Buttons
onClosePush(BBjButtonPushEvent) - Method in class Notification
event that gets called by the dismissbutton
onRedirectPush(BBjEvent) - Method in class Notification
called by the redirect Button
onWindowPush(BBjEvent) - Method in class Notification
called when the window was clicked and an eventhandle was given

R

reposition() - Method in class NotificationManager
reposition the entirety of displayed notifications
row! - Variable in class NotificationButton
 

S

setAnimate(Boolean) - Method in class NotificationManager
change the animate property which controlls if the animationfeature is used or not
setPosition(int, int, Boolean) - Method in class Notification
set the notification to a given x/y position if wished it will slowly drop down to its new respective ypos

T

text! - Variable in class Notification
Text displayed on the lower part of the Notification
text! - Variable in class NotificationButton
 
textTitle! - Variable in class Notification
Title of the Notification displayed on the upper half
title! - Variable in class Notification
Title of the Notification (not displayed)

V

validateURL() - Method in class Notification
check if an URL is valid to launch for the redirect Button

W

waittime! - Static variable in class Notification
The timer that slows down the animation, the lower this will get the faster the Notification will be
width! - Variable in class Notification
Width of the Notification
width! - Variable in class NotificationButton
 
wnd! - Variable in class Notification
The Window itself

X

x! - Variable in class Notification
x coordinate of the Notification

Y

y! - Variable in class Notification
y coordinate of the Notification
